Team vs Team


Description: Players are randomly divided into two teams - red and blue. The award winning team get the players to kill more opponents. You may use any items. Buffs are removed before the fight. Event held in 3 different locations in A parallel world. Given 3 minutes to register, 1 minute on teleportation, 5 minutes for the fight. At the end of the event period, all participants are resurrected, cured, and teleport back. In case of death, the experience is not lost. To register for the opening event, you must be in a peaceful area, be visible, not registered to the Olympics and to be alive. In pratvivnom cases, the registration will not be accepted. Your level should be as specified in the announcement category. Purpose - kill more opponents.
Time of Event: 9:00 12:00 15:00 18:00 21:00 00:00
Number of participants: Up to 50 participants
Prizes: 300 Event-Medal
